name: Falling Bombs (BD Games)
description:
Balls are dropping! Let's play Falling Bombs, your brand new time killer.

If you enjoy challenges, it's your game!

You need to drop the balls and collect as many as you can to finish the level and go to the next one.

Choose the right place to drop the balls to maximize your collecting.

See them rolling down to the end of the stage.

Are you ready for your next Addictive game? Just release the balls and try to gather as many as possible.

Do you think it's easy to release the balls and collect them in the final stages? Let's try to find out.

Features:

* Simple rules but very attractive

* Lots of exciting challenges
